00037 namespace physics {

00040 class CSGShape : virtual public ComplexShape
00041 {
00042 public:
00043   CSGShape(const CSGShape& csgshape);
00044   CSGShape(const PolygonModel& t);
00045   virtual ~CSGShape();
00046 
00047   virtual String className() const { return String("CSGShape"); }
00048 
00049   virtual CSGShape& clone() const { return *NewNamedObj(className()) CSGShape(*this); }
00050 
00051   virtual BoundingBox    getBoundingBox() const;
00052   virtual BoundingSphere getBoundingSphere() const;
00053   virtual const MassProperties& getMassProperties(const Material& material) const 
00054     { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not implemented")); }
00055   
00056   // Collidable
00057   virtual CollisionModel& getCollisionModel(CollisionModel::CollisionModelType modelType) const
00058   { throw std::runtime_error(Exception("not implemented")); }
00059 
00060   CSGShape& operator=(const CSGShape& csgshape);
00061   
00062   CSGShape& operator+=(const gfx::Vector3& translation);
00063   CSGShape& operator*=(const gfx::Quat4& rotation);
00064   CSGShape& operator*=(Real scale);
00065   CSGShape& operator&=(const CSGShape& s);
00066   CSGShape& operator|=(const CSGShape& s);
00067   CSGShape& operator-=(const CSGShape& s);
00068   
00069 protected:
00070   virtual osg::GeoSet& getGeoSet() const;
00071 
00072   enum CSGOperation { Leaf, Union, Intersection, Difference, Translation, Rotation, Scale };
00073   CSGOperation operation;
00074   gfx::Vector3 trans;
00075   gfx::Quat4   rot;
00076   Real         scale;
00077   
00078   const PolygonModel* leaf;
00079   CSGShape* child1;
00080   CSGShape* child2;
00081   
00082   CSGShape() : operation(Leaf) {}
00083   void shallowCopyTo(CSGShape& s);
00084 };
